answers.answer: I was 140 and now im 32 weeks I am now 156.  I didnt gain much with either of my kids since my metabolism stayed with me and im very active and eat healthy
I was 190 prepregrancy, at 31wks I'm 222. I've gained about 32
Pre pregnancy I was 157 at 11 weeks I'm 153.
I'm195 after. pre pregnancy I was 208. at 38 weeks i was 230

My first pregnancy I was a great weight at 145lbs sadly I didn't listen to myndr and listened to my mom who said I could eat what ever I want and I gained over 40lbs. This time around I started out heavier because I moved only to end of moving back where I came from so I wasn't exercising like I used to. *sigh*  I gained weight over the winter so I started out heavier than the first time. Luckily this time around I've only gained 14lbs because I refuse to get over 205lbs for this baby. Luckily I didn't get gestational diabetes the first time around and I'm hoping not to have it this time.

My first I weighed 125 and was 204 when I had him it was ridiculous. But last time I was 150, went to 173. This time I was 158 to start and at 14 wks today I'm only up to 164.  I'm a rn so if you develop gestational diabetes its a sign that its something you will develop later in life. As well as high blood pressure. They say if you get high blood pressure  chances of having issues with it in life are a lot higher. Its weird how it works.
100 preprego and 112 at 25 weeks, up 12 lbs so far
Started out 198lbs & have gained 14lbs at 32 weeks.
Started at 138 ish,  I average 136 now, I'm 11 weeks pregnant. My goal is to get to 150 by the end.
Started pregnancy at 150lbs and at almost 28 weeks I am now 175lbs. It feels like a lot but even my Dr said its all in my belly and boobs but I see it in my thighs and face too.
I was 116lbs . I'm 24weeks Tuesday and weigh 132. So about 16 lbs so far
I started out 135 and went down to 120 due to hg. Now in my 2 nd tr.and maybe gained back 3 lbs but she's growing great!!!
Started out at 116...now I am 130 at 14 weeks...
With my first I started at 133 and went to 182, with my second I started at 146 and went to 173, and this time I started at 149 I'm now 33 weeks and I weigh 167
pre-pregnancy I was about 120 I'm 28w4d and I weigh 152 so I've gained 32lbs
I started at 146 at 16 weeks I weight 149. Is that normal?

With my first I was 220 pre pregnancy, day I delivered I weighed 230 and he weighed 10'9 and I'm 25 weeks with my second, pre pregnancy I was 224 now I'm 223 I've lost weight during my pregnancies so does my sister
I started at 142, and at 5 months I am 129 lbs

I'm 5'6" and started at 123 lbs. I'm 36 + 4 and I weigh 151 lbs now. So I've gained 28. It doesn't sound like alot but I feel so gross. It all went to my legs. My arms and upper body are still very thin and thighs and calves are like tree trunks covered in cellulite all the way down to my ankles.
120 prepregnancy I am now 37 weeks and 4 days and I weight 156 so I've gained 36 pounds. Everybody says I look all baby but with that much gained I know its note than that.

question: What was your pre pregnancy weight and how much have you gain??A year ago I was 185 lbs, I lost 45 lbs and before getting pregnant I was 140, I now weight 150, I decided to lose weight because I didn't want to get gestational diabetes, but it seems as I'm still developing!
title: pre-pregnancy weight???
